question: Match the following:
columnA: Audio-visual and the print-media
Introduction of sex education in schools

Educating people, especially fertile couples and those in marriageable age group
columnB: Would help people, especially those in the adolescent age group to lead a reproductively healthy life
Should be encouraged to provide right information to the young so as to discourage children from believing in myths and having misconceptions about sex-related aspects
Governmental and non-governmental agencies have taken various steps to create awareness among the people about reproduction-related aspects
Would address the importance of bringing up socially conscious healthy families of desired size

answer.Audio-visual and the print-media: Governmental and non-governmental agencies have taken various steps to create awareness among the people about reproduction-related aspects
answer.Introduction of sex education in schools: Should be encouraged to provide right information to the young so as to discourage children from believing in myths and having misconceptions about sex-related aspects
answer.Proper information about reproductive or: Would help people, especially those in the adolescent age group to lead a reproductively healthy life
answer.Educating people, especially fertile cou: Would address the importance of bringing up socially conscious healthy families of desired size
